execution_plan.description: Count how many times each product_id appears in Order_Items (frequency a product is listed in orders).
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product details (id, name, price) for the product_ids found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
